text: Mangifera campnospermoides is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is a tree endemic to Kalimantan in Indonesia. It is a critically endangered species threatened by habitat loss. ==References== campnospermoides Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Flora of Kalimantan Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mangifera campnospermoides
